oracle.pg.text.lucene

Class LuceneParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.IndexParametersBase
      • oracle.pg.text.lucene.LuceneParameters

  • public class LuceneParameters
extends IndexParametersBase
    This class manages the parameters and utilities for Lucene index directories

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LuceneParameters(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Parameter[] indexParams, OraclePropertyGraphBase opg)
      Creates a new LuceneParameters object from the given array of parameters and the property graph associated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets the Lucene Analyzer associated to this index

      Gets the Directory Type used in this index.

      Gets the location(s) of the directories where the index will be stored.

      Gets the location of the directory associated to this index.

      Gets the number of directories used to store the index.

      Gets the Lucene Version to use for indexes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LuceneParameters

        public LuceneParameters(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Parameter[] indexParams,
                        OraclePropertyGraphBase opg)
        Creates a new LuceneParameters object from the given array of parameters and the property graph associated.
        Parameters:
        indexParams - the array of parameters used to create a text index. If NULL, the parameters will be obtained from the default parameters of the property graph instance using m_opg.getDefaultIndexParameters().
        opg - an OraclePropertyGraphBase instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnalyzer

        public org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer()
        Gets the Lucene Analyzer associated to this index
        Returns:
        an Analyzer object.

      • getDirectoryType

        public OracleDirectory.DirectoryType getDirectoryType()
        Gets the Directory Type used in this index.
        Returns:
        a OracleDirectory.DirectoryType object. The default value is set to DirectoryType.FS_DIRECTORY.

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String[] getLocation()
        Gets the location(s) of the directories where the index will be stored.
        Returns:
        a String array with the he location(s) of the directories where the index will be stored.

      • getLocationsAsString

        public java.lang.String getLocationsAsString()
        Gets the location of the directory associated to this index.
        Returns:
        the location of the directory.

      • getNumSubDirs

        public int getNumSubDirs()
        Gets the number of directories used to store the index.
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the number of directories used to store the index. The default value is set to 1.

      • getVersion

        public org.apache.lucene.util.Version getVersion()
        Gets the Lucene Version to use for indexes.
        Returns:
        a Version object specifying the Lucene version to use for indexes. The default value is set to Version.LUCENE_45.

      • useDatatypes

        public boolean useDatatypes()
        Validates if values in Vertex/Edge properties should be indexed as Datatype fields or as TextFields.
        Returns:
        true if values in Vertex/Edge properties should be indexed as Datatype fields, else return false. The default value is set to true.
